ingredients: spaghetti; pancetta or guanciale; eggs; Pecorino Romano; black pepper; salt; olive oil
instructions: Boil spaghetti until al dente. Fry pancetta in a pan until crisp. Whisk eggs with grated Pecorino and pepper. Toss hot pasta with pancetta and fat off the heat, then quickly mix in egg mixture until creamy. Season and serve immediately.
tags: comfort food; contains pork; not vegetarian

ingredients: pizza dough; tomato passata; mozzarella; fresh basil; olive oil; salt
instructions: Stretch dough into a thin round. Spread a thin layer of tomato passata, scatter sliced mozzarella and a drizzle of olive oil. Bake in a very hot oven until puffed and golden, then top with fresh basil leaves and serve.

ingredients: tagliatelle or spaghetti; minced beef; onion; carrot; celery; garlic; tomato puree; chopped tomatoes; red wine; milk; olive oil; salt; pepper; Italian herbs
instructions: Sauté finely chopped onion, carrot, celery and garlic in olive oil. Add minced beef and brown well. Stir in tomato puree, chopped tomatoes, wine and a splash of milk. Simmer until rich and thick. Serve over cooked pasta.

ingredients: penne; garlic; crushed red chilli flakes; canned tomatoes; olive oil; parsley; salt; pepper
instructions: Cook penne until al dente. Gently fry sliced garlic and chilli flakes in olive oil. Add canned tomatoes, season and simmer until slightly thickened. Toss in the penne and chopped parsley, then serve.

ingredients: Arborio rice; onion; butter; olive oil; white wine; chicken stock; saffron; Parmesan; salt; pepper
instructions: Soften finely chopped onion in butter and oil. Stir in rice and toast briefly. Add wine and let it evaporate. Gradually add hot stock with saffron, stirring until creamy. Finish with butter and Parmesan.

ingredients: spaghetti or trofie; fresh basil; pine nuts; garlic; Parmesan; Pecorino; olive oil; salt
instructions: Cook pasta until al dente. Blend basil, pine nuts, garlic, cheeses and olive oil into a loose paste. Toss hot drained pasta with pesto and a splash of cooking water until glossy.

ingredients: lasagne sheets; minced beef; onion; carrot; celery; garlic; tomato sauce; butter; flour; milk; nutmeg; mozzarella; Parmesan; olive oil; salt; pepper
instructions: Cook a meat sauce by sautéing vegetables and browning beef, then simmering with tomato sauce. Make a white sauce with butter, flour and milk. Layer lasagne sheets with meat sauce, white sauce and cheese. Bake until bubbling and golden.
tags: family meal; high calorie; contains gluten

ingredients: eggplant; tomato sauce; mozzarella; Parmesan; basil; flour; eggs; breadcrumbs; olive oil; salt; pepper
instructions: Slice eggplant and coat in flour, beaten egg and breadcrumbs. Fry until golden. Layer in a dish with tomato sauce, mozzarella, Parmesan and basil. Bake until the cheese melts and the top is browned.

ingredients: ripe tomatoes; fresh mozzarella; basil; extra virgin olive oil; balsamic vinegar; salt; pepper
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Arrange alternating slices on a plate with basil leaves. Drizzle with olive oil and a little balsamic, then season with salt and pepper.

ingredients: onion; carrot; celery; garlic; potatoes; courgette; canned tomatoes; cannellini beans; small pasta; vegetable stock; olive oil; Italian herbs; salt; pepper
instructions: Sauté chopped onion, carrot, celery and garlic in olive oil. Add diced vegetables, tomatoes, beans, herbs and stock. Simmer until tender, then add small pasta and cook until al dente.

ingredients: chicken thighs; yogurt; lemon juice; garlic; ginger; garam masala; butter; tomato puree; cream; chilli powder; fenugreek leaves; salt; oil
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, spices, garlic and ginger, then grill or pan-fry until charred. In a pan, cook tomato puree with butter and spices, then add cream. Simmer chicken in the sauce until tender.

ingredients: canned chickpeas; onion; tomato; garlic; ginger; green chilli; cumin seeds; coriander powder; garam masala; turmeric; oil; salt; lemon; coriander leaves
instructions: Fry cumin seeds in hot oil. Add chopped onion, garlic, ginger and chilli and cook until golden. Stir in tomatoes and spices and cook to a thick paste. Add chickpeas and a little water, simmer and finish with lemon and coriander.

ingredients: spinach; paneer; onion; tomato; garlic; ginger; green chilli; garam masala; cumin seeds; cream; oil; salt
instructions: Blanch spinach and blend to a smooth puree. Fry cumin seeds, then add onion, garlic, ginger and chilli until golden. Stir in tomato and spices, then add spinach puree. Simmer and add paneer cubes and a splash of cream.

ingredients: chicken breast; yogurt; garlic; ginger; garam masala; cumin; tomato puree; cream; onion; butter; chilli powder; coriander; salt
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, then grill or roast until lightly charred. Fry onion in butter, add spices and tomato puree and cook to a thick sauce. Add cream and grilled chicken and simmer briefly.

ingredients: basmati rice; mixed vegetables; onion; yogurt; ginger garlic paste; biryani masala; whole spices; saffron; ghee; coriander; mint; salt
instructions: Parboil basmati rice with whole spices. Fry onions until golden, then cook vegetables with yogurt and biryani spices. Layer rice and vegetable masala in a pot with saffron milk and ghee, then steam until fragrant.

ingredients: yellow lentils; tomato; onion; garlic; ginger; cumin seeds; mustard seeds; turmeric; chilli powder; oil; coriander leaves; salt
instructions: Boil lentils with turmeric and salt until soft. In a pan, heat ghee, crackle cumin and mustard seeds, then fry onion, garlic and ginger until golden with spices. Pour the tempering over the cooked dal and garnish with coriander.

ingredients: potatoes; cauliflower; onion; tomato; garlic; ginger; cumin seeds; coriander powder; turmeric; chilli powder; oil; salt; coriander leaves
instructions: Heat oil and fry cumin seeds. Add onion, garlic and ginger until translucent. Stir in spices, then add potato cubes and cauliflower florets. Cook covered until tender, tossing occasionally, then finish with coriander leaves.

ingredients: lamb chunks; yogurt; onion; garlic; ginger; Kashmiri chilli powder; garam masala; whole spices; tomato puree; oil; salt
instructions: Brown lamb in oil and set aside. Cook sliced onions until deep golden, then add garlic, ginger and spices. Stir in tomato puree and yogurt, then return lamb and add water. Simmer gently until the meat is very tender.

ingredients: rice dosa batter; potatoes; onion; green chilli; mustard seeds; curry leaves; turmeric; oil; salt; ghee
instructions: Cook potatoes and mash roughly. Make a tempering with oil, mustard seeds, curry leaves, onion, chilli and turmeric, then stir in potatoes. Spread dosa batter on a hot pan, drizzle with ghee, fill with potato masala and fold.

ingredients: paneer; tomato puree; onion; garlic; ginger; butter; cream; cashews; garam masala; chilli powder; sugar; salt
instructions: Blend sautéed onion, tomatoes and soaked cashews to a smooth sauce. Cook the sauce with butter and spices until rich, then stir in cream and paneer cubes. Simmer briefly and serve.

ingredients: chicken thighs; achiote paste; pineapple juice; vinegar; garlic; oregano; cumin; tortillas; pineapple; onion; coriander; lime; salt
instructions: Marinate sliced chicken in achiote, pineapple juice, vinegar, garlic and spices. Grill or pan-fry until charred at the edges. Serve on warm tortillas with diced pineapple, onion, coriander and lime.

ingredients: large flour tortillas; minced beef; onion; garlic; cumin; chilli powder; cooked rice; black beans; cheddar cheese; salsa; sour cream; lettuce; oil; salt
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in oil, then brown minced beef with spices. Warm tortillas and layer with rice, beef, beans, cheese, salsa and lettuce. Roll tightly into burritos and toast in a dry pan if desired.

ingredients: flour tortillas; cooked shredded chicken; cheddar; bell peppers; onion; oil; salt; pepper
instructions: Cook sliced peppers and onions until soft. Layer a tortilla with cheese, chicken and vegetables, then top with another tortilla. Cook in a lightly oiled pan until both sides are golden and cheese melts, then slice into wedges.

ingredients: corn tortilla chips; black beans; jalapeños; cheddar; salsa; sour cream; guacamole; coriander
instructions: Spread tortilla chips on a baking tray, top with beans, jalapeños and grated cheese. Bake until cheese melts. Serve with spoons of salsa, sour cream, guacamole and coriander.

ingredients: corn tortillas; shredded chicken; salsa verde; onion; garlic; coriander; sour cream; cheese; oil; salt
instructions: Warm salsa verde in a pan. Lightly fry tortillas in oil, then dip in salsa. Fill with chicken, roll and place in a baking dish. Cover with more salsa and cheese, then bake until bubbling. Serve with sour cream and coriander.

ingredients: corn tortillas; eggs; tomato sauce; onion; garlic; jalapeño; black beans; coriander; oil; salt; pepper
instructions: Cook a simple tomato sauce with onion, garlic and jalapeño. Fry tortillas until crisp. Fry eggs sunny-side up. Serve eggs on tortillas topped with warm sauce, beans and coriander.

ingredients: ripe avocados; red onion; tomato; lime juice; coriander; jalapeño; salt
instructions: Mash avocados in a bowl. Stir in finely chopped onion, tomato, coriander and jalapeño. Season with lime juice and salt to taste.

ingredients: chicken breast; bell peppers; onion; fajita seasoning; oil; flour tortillas; lime; sour cream; salsa
instructions: Slice chicken and vegetables. Toss with oil and fajita seasoning, then cook in a hot pan until chicken is done and vegetables are slightly charred. Serve with warm tortillas and toppings.

ingredients: crispy tostada shells; refried beans; seasoned minced beef; lettuce; tomato; cheese; sour cream; salsa
instructions: Spread warm refried beans over tostada shells. Top with cooked spiced minced beef, shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, cheese and sour cream. Spoon over salsa and serve immediately.

ingredients: white fish fillets; lime juice; chilli powder; cumin; corn tortillas; cabbage; yogurt; coriander; salt; oil
instructions: Marinate fish in lime juice and spices, then pan-fry until flaky. Toss shredded cabbage with yogurt, lime and coriander. Serve fish in warm tortillas topped with slaw.

ingredients: cooked rice; chicken; egg; peas; carrots; spring onion; soy sauce; sesame oil; garlic; vegetable oil; salt; pepper
instructions: Scramble eggs in a hot wok and set aside. Stir-fry diced chicken until cooked, then add vegetables and garlic. Add rice, soy sauce and sesame oil, tossing until hot. Stir eggs back in and finish with spring onion.

ingredients: beef strips; broccoli florets; garlic; ginger; soy sauce; oyster sauce; cornstarch; sugar; vegetable oil; water
instructions: Marinate beef briefly in soy sauce and cornstarch. Stir-fry beef in hot oil until just browned, then remove. Stir-fry broccoli with garlic and ginger, add sauces and a splash of water, then return beef and cook until the sauce thickens.

ingredients: diced chicken; peanuts; dried chillies; spring onion; garlic; ginger; soy sauce; black vinegar; sugar; cornstarch; oil
instructions: Marinate chicken in soy sauce and cornstarch. Fry dried chillies until fragrant, then add chicken and stir-fry. Add garlic, ginger and sauce mixture, cooking until glossy. Toss in peanuts and spring onion and serve.

ingredients: soft tofu; minced pork; doubanjiang chili bean paste; garlic; ginger; Sichuan peppercorn; soy sauce; stock; cornstarch; spring onion; oil
instructions: Brown minced pork with garlic and ginger. Stir in chili bean paste and Sichuan peppercorn, then add stock and tofu cubes. Simmer briefly, then thicken with cornstarch slurry. Garnish with spring onion.

ingredients: chow mein noodles; cabbage; carrots; bell peppers; bean sprouts; soy sauce; oyster sauce; garlic; sesame oil; vegetable oil; spring onion
instructions: Cook noodles and drain. Stir-fry vegetables and garlic in hot oil. Add noodles and sauces, tossing until heated through. Finish with sesame oil and spring onion.

ingredients: pork cubes; pineapple; bell peppers; onion; ketchup; vinegar; sugar; soy sauce; cornstarch; flour; oil; salt
instructions: Coat pork in a light batter of flour and cornstarch and deep-fry until crispy. Stir-fry vegetables and pineapple, then add a sauce made from ketchup, vinegar, sugar and soy sauce. Toss pork in the sauce until coated.

ingredients: wheat noodles; minced pork; preserved vegetables; chilli oil; soy sauce; peanut butter; garlic; Sichuan peppercorn; spring onion; stock
instructions: Fry minced pork with garlic and preserved vegetables. Mix a sauce with chilli oil, sesame paste, soy and a little stock. Cook noodles, then toss with sauce, pork and spring onion.
tags: spicy; street food; contains nuts or sesame

ingredients: white fish fillets; ginger; spring onion; soy sauce; sesame oil; vegetable oil; coriander
instructions: Place fish on a plate with julienned ginger and steam until just cooked. Heat soy sauce, sesame oil and a little water. Pour sauce over fish, then scatter spring onion and coriander and finish with a splash of hot oil.

ingredients: day-old rice; eggs; spring onion; peas; carrots; soy sauce; vegetable oil; sesame oil; salt; pepper
instructions: Scramble eggs in hot oil and set aside. Stir-fry rice until hot, then add vegetables, soy sauce and sesame oil. Stir in eggs and spring onion and season.

ingredients: chicken stock; tofu; mushrooms; bamboo shoots; soy sauce; vinegar; white pepper; chilli oil; cornstarch; egg; spring onion
instructions: Bring stock to a simmer with mushrooms and bamboo shoots. Season with soy sauce, vinegar, pepper and chilli oil. Thicken with cornstarch slurry, then slowly drizzle in beaten egg while stirring. Add tofu and spring onion.

ingredients: chicken breast; panko breadcrumbs; flour; egg; onion; carrot; curry powder; chicken stock; rice; oil; salt
instructions: Coat chicken in flour, egg and panko, then shallow-fry until crisp and cooked through. Simmer sliced onion and carrot in stock with Japanese curry roux until thick. Serve sliced katsu over rice with curry sauce.

ingredients: salmon fillets; soy sauce; mirin; sugar; ginger; sesame seeds; spring onion; oil
instructions: Marinate salmon briefly in soy, mirin, sugar and grated ginger. Pan-fry until almost cooked, then pour in marinade and reduce to a glossy glaze. Garnish with sesame seeds and spring onion.

ingredients: sushi rice; nori sheets; cucumber; carrot; avocado; rice vinegar; sugar; salt; soy sauce; wasabi
instructions: Season cooked rice with vinegar, sugar and salt. Spread rice thinly on nori, add strips of vegetables, then roll tightly and slice. Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

ingredients: dashi stock; miso paste; tofu; wakame seaweed; spring onion
instructions: Warm dashi stock gently. Stir in miso paste off the boil until dissolved. Add tofu cubes and soaked wakame, heat briefly and garnish with spring onion.

ingredients: chicken thigh; soy sauce; mirin; sake; sugar; spring onion; skewers
instructions: Thread chicken and spring onion onto skewers. Grill or pan-cook while brushing with a reduced mixture of soy, mirin, sake and sugar until glossy and cooked through.

ingredients: pork loin cutlets; flour; egg; panko breadcrumbs; oil; salt; pepper; cabbage; tonkatsu sauce
instructions: Season pork, coat in flour, egg and panko. Deep-fry or shallow-fry until golden and cooked through. Slice and serve with shredded cabbage and tonkatsu sauce.

ingredients: udon noodles; thinly sliced beef; stock; soy sauce; mirin; sugar; spring onion; mushrooms
instructions: Simmer stock with soy, mirin and sugar. Add beef and mushrooms and cook briefly. Add cooked udon noodles and garnish with spring onion.

ingredients: cabbage; flour; eggs; dashi; spring onion; bacon; okonomiyaki sauce; mayonnaise; bonito flakes
instructions: Mix chopped cabbage, flour, eggs and water into a thick batter. Pour into a hot pan, top with pork slices and cook both sides until browned. Serve with okonomiyaki sauce, mayonnaise and bonito flakes.

ingredients: prawns; mixed vegetables; tempura flour; cold water; oil; soy dipping sauce
instructions: Mix a light batter with tempura flour and icy water. Dip prawns and sliced vegetables in batter and fry in hot oil until pale golden and crisp. Serve immediately with dipping sauce.

ingredients: thinly sliced beef; onion; soy sauce; mirin; sugar; stock; rice; pickled ginger
instructions: Simmer onion in a mix of dashi, soy, mirin and sugar. Add beef slices and cook briefly. Serve over hot rice with pickled ginger.

ingredients: rice noodles; prawns; eggs; beansprouts; spring onion; garlic; tamarind paste; fish sauce; palm sugar; peanuts; lime; oil
instructions: Soak rice noodles until pliable. Stir-fry garlic and prawns, push aside and scramble eggs. Add noodles, tamarind, fish sauce and sugar, tossing until glossy. Stir in beansprouts and spring onion, then top with peanuts and lime.

ingredients: chicken; green curry paste; coconut milk; Thai basil; fish sauce; sugar; aubergine; green beans; kaffir lime leaves; oil
instructions: Fry curry paste in oil until fragrant. Add coconut milk and bring to a simmer. Add chicken and vegetables and cook until tender. Season with fish sauce and sugar and finish with basil and lime leaves.

ingredients: prawns; lemongrass; kaffir lime leaves; galangal; mushrooms; fish sauce; lime juice; Thai chillies; coriander; stock
instructions: Simmer stock with lemongrass, lime leaves and galangal. Add prawns and mushrooms and cook briefly. Season with fish sauce, lime juice and chillies. Garnish with coriander.

ingredients: beef chunks; massaman curry paste; coconut milk; potatoes; onion; roasted peanuts; tamarind; fish sauce; sugar; oil
instructions: Fry curry paste in oil until aromatic. Add coconut milk and beef and simmer gently until tender. Add potatoes and onion and cook until soft. Season with tamarind, fish sauce and sugar, and stir in peanuts.

ingredients: minced chicken; garlic; Thai chillies; fish sauce; soy sauce; sugar; Thai basil; green beans; oil; rice
instructions: Crush garlic and chillies, then fry briefly in hot oil. Add minced chicken and beans and stir-fry. Season with fish sauce, soy and sugar, then stir in basil leaves until wilted. Serve over rice.

ingredients: shredded green papaya; cherry tomatoes; green beans; garlic; Thai chillies; fish sauce; lime juice; palm sugar; roasted peanuts
instructions: Pound garlic and chillies in a mortar. Add sugar, fish sauce and lime juice to make a dressing. Toss with papaya, beans, tomatoes and peanuts.

ingredients: firm tofu; red curry paste; coconut milk; mixed vegetables; Thai basil; fish sauce; sugar; oil
instructions: Fry curry paste in oil. Add coconut milk and bring to a simmer. Add tofu cubes and vegetables and cook until tender. Season and finish with Thai basil.

recipe_name: Pad See Ew (Stir-Fried Wide Rice Noodles)
ingredients: wide rice noodles; Chinese broccoli; egg; soy sauce; dark soy; sugar; garlic; oil
instructions: Stir-fry garlic in hot oil, then add egg and scramble. Add noodles and Chinese broccoli, then season with light and dark soy and sugar. Toss over high heat until slightly charred.

recipe_name: Thai Coconut Sticky Rice with Mango
ingredients: glutinous rice; coconut milk; sugar; salt; ripe mango; sesame seeds
instructions: Steam soaked glutinous rice until tender. Warm coconut milk with sugar and salt and stir most into the rice. Serve with sliced mango and drizzle with extra coconut milk and sesame seeds.

ingredients: day-old rice; crab meat; egg; garlic; spring onion; fish sauce; soy sauce; white pepper; oil; lime
instructions: Stir-fry garlic in oil, add egg and scramble. Add rice and crab meat and toss. Season with fish sauce, soy and pepper, then garnish with spring onion and lime.

ingredients: eggplant; potatoes; minced beef; onion; garlic; tomato puree; cinnamon; oregano; red wine; béchamel sauce; cheese; olive oil; salt; pepper
instructions: Roast or fry sliced eggplant and potatoes. Cook a spiced meat sauce with onion, garlic, tomato and wine. Layer vegetables and meat in a dish, top with thick béchamel and cheese and bake until golden.
tags: comfort food; contains dairy; contains gluten

ingredients: tomatoes; cucumber; red onion; green pepper; Kalamata olives; feta; oregano; olive oil; red wine vinegar; salt
instructions: Chunk vegetables into a bowl, add olives and a slab of feta. Drizzle with olive oil and vinegar, sprinkle with oregano and salt.
tags: vegetarian; gluten free; high in vegetables

ingredients: chicken breast; lemon juice; garlic; oregano; olive oil; pita bread; tomato; onion; tzatziki; lettuce; salt; pepper
instructions: Marinate chicken in lemon, garlic, oregano and oil, then grill on skewers. Serve in warm pita with vegetables and tzatziki.

ingredients: spinach; feta; onion; dill; eggs; filo pastry; butter; salt; pepper
instructions: Sauté onion and wilt spinach, then mix with crumbled feta, dill and eggs. Layer filo sheets brushed with butter in a tray, add filling and cover with more filo. Bake until crisp and golden.

ingredients: Greek yogurt; cucumber; garlic; olive oil; lemon juice; dill; salt; pepper
instructions: Grate cucumber and squeeze out excess water. Mix with yogurt, crushed garlic, olive oil, lemon juice and dill. Season and chill before serving.

ingredients: chicken pieces; bacon; mushrooms; pearl onions; red wine; chicken stock; garlic; thyme; flour; butter; oil; salt; pepper
instructions: Brown bacon and chicken in a heavy pot. Add vegetables and garlic, then sprinkle with flour. Pour in wine and stock, add herbs and simmer slowly until chicken is tender and sauce is glossy.

ingredients: aubergine; courgette; peppers; onion; garlic; tomatoes; olive oil; thyme; basil; salt; pepper
instructions: Sauté vegetables separately in olive oil until softened, then combine in a pot with tomatoes, garlic and herbs. Simmer until tender and flavoursome.
tags: vegan; gluten free; high in vegetables

ingredients: shortcrust pastry; eggs; cream; milk; bacon lardons; Gruyère cheese; salt; pepper; nutmeg
instructions: Blind bake pastry. Fry bacon until crisp. Whisk eggs with cream, milk and seasoning. Scatter bacon and cheese in the pastry case, pour over custard and bake until set and golden.

ingredients: beef chunks; bacon; mushrooms; carrots; onion; red wine; beef stock; tomato paste; garlic; thyme; bay leaf; flour; butter; oil; salt; pepper
instructions: Brown bacon and beef, then set aside. Sauté vegetables and garlic, stir in flour and tomato paste, then add wine and stock. Return beef and simmer gently until very tender.

ingredients: tuna; green beans; potatoes; tomatoes; olives; boiled eggs; anchovies; lettuce; olive oil; red wine vinegar; Dijon mustard; salt; pepper
instructions: Boil potatoes and beans until tender. Arrange lettuce on a platter with potatoes, beans, tomatoes, olives, tuna and eggs. Drizzle with a mustard vinaigrette and top with anchovies if using.

ingredients: chicken thighs; shawarma spice mix; garlic; lemon juice; yogurt; olive oil; rice; cucumber; tomato; parsley; tahini sauce; salt
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon, garlic and spices, then roast or grill until charred. Serve over rice or bulgur with salad and tahini sauce.

ingredients: dried chickpeas; onion; garlic; parsley; coriander leaves; cumin; coriander powder; flour; baking powder; tahini; lemon juice; oil; salt
instructions: Soak chickpeas and blend with herbs, spices, onion and garlic to a coarse paste. Form balls and deep-fry until crisp. Serve with tahini, lemon and water whisked into a sauce.

ingredients: cooked chickpeas; tahini; garlic; lemon juice; olive oil; salt; cumin; water
instructions: Blend chickpeas, tahini, garlic, lemon juice and cumin with a little water until smooth. Adjust seasoning and drizzle with olive oil.

ingredients: minced lamb; onion; garlic; parsley; cumin; coriander; paprika; salt; pepper; skewers; yogurt sauce
instructions: Mix lamb with finely chopped onion, garlic, herbs and spices. Shape onto skewers and grill until cooked through and slightly charred. Serve with yogurt sauce.

ingredients: bulgur wheat; parsley; mint; tomatoes; spring onion; lemon juice; olive oil; salt; pepper
instructions: Soak bulgur in hot water until tender, then drain. Mix with finely chopped herbs, tomatoes and spring onion. Dress with lemon juice and olive oil and season.

ingredients: minced beef; salt; pepper; burger buns; cheese slices; lettuce; tomato; onion; pickles; ketchup; mustard
instructions: Form beef into patties and season. Grill or pan-fry until cooked to your liking, adding cheese to melt. Serve in toasted buns with toppings and sauces.

ingredients: macaroni; butter; flour; milk; cheddar cheese; mustard powder; salt; pepper; breadcrumbs
instructions: Cook macaroni until al dente. Make a roux with butter and flour, whisk in milk and cook until thick. Stir in cheese and seasoning, then mix with pasta. Top with breadcrumbs and bake until golden.

ingredients: chicken wings; flour; butter; hot sauce; garlic powder; salt; pepper; oil; celery; blue cheese dip
instructions: Coat wings in seasoned flour and fry or bake until crisp. Toss in a mixture of melted butter and hot sauce. Serve with celery sticks and blue cheese dip.

ingredients: romaine lettuce; chicken breast; croutons; Parmesan; anchovies; garlic; lemon juice; olive oil; egg; Dijon mustard; salt; pepper
instructions: Grill seasoned chicken until cooked, then slice. Blend dressing ingredients to a creamy sauce. Toss lettuce with dressing, top with croutons, chicken and shaved Parmesan.
tags: high protein; contains gluten; contains fish

ingredients: dark chocolate; butter; sugar; eggs; flour; cocoa powder; salt; vanilla extract
instructions: Melt chocolate and butter together. Whisk in sugar and eggs, then fold in dry ingredients. Pour into a lined tin and bake until just set and fudgy.

ingredients: paella rice; prawns; mussels; squid; chicken stock; onion; garlic; tomato; saffron; paprika; peas; olive oil; lemon; salt
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic and tomato in olive oil. Add rice, saffron and paprika and toast briefly. Pour in stock and simmer without stirring. Arrange seafood and peas on top and cook until rice is tender and seafood is done.

ingredients: potatoes; onion; eggs; olive oil; salt; pepper
instructions: Slowly fry sliced potatoes and onion in plenty of olive oil until tender. Drain, then mix with beaten eggs and season. Cook in a pan on both sides until set in the centre.

ingredients: potatoes; olive oil; tomato sauce; garlic; smoked paprika; chilli; mayonnaise; salt; pepper
instructions: Roast or fry potato cubes until crisp. Simmer tomato sauce with garlic, paprika and chilli to make a spicy bravas sauce. Serve potatoes topped with sauce and mayonnaise.

ingredients: prawns; garlic; olive oil; chilli flakes; parsley; lemon; salt
instructions: Gently fry sliced garlic and chilli in olive oil until fragrant. Add prawns and cook just until pink. Finish with parsley and lemon.

ingredients: crusty bread; ripe tomatoes; garlic; olive oil; salt
instructions: Toast bread slices. Rub with garlic and ripe tomato, letting the juices soak in. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.

ingredients: beef bones; beef brisket; rice noodles; onion; ginger; star anise; cinnamon; fish sauce; sugar; beansprouts; herbs; lime; chilli
instructions: Simmer beef bones with charred onion, ginger and spices for several hours to make broth. Cook rice noodles separately. Serve noodles in bowls topped with sliced beef and pour over hot broth. Garnish with beansprouts, herbs, lime and chilli.
tags: comfort food; high protein; dairy free

ingredients: baguette; marinated grilled pork; pickled carrots; pickled daikon; cucumber; coriander; mayonnaise; chilli; soy sauce
instructions: Grill marinated pork until caramelised. Spread baguette with mayonnaise and soy, then fill with pork, pickled vegetables, cucumber, coriander and chilli.

ingredients: rice paper wrappers; prawns; rice vermicelli; lettuce; herbs; cucumber; carrots; peanut dipping sauce
instructions: Soak rice paper briefly, then fill with cooked prawns, noodles, vegetables and herbs. Roll tightly and serve with peanut sauce.

ingredients: pork patties; pork belly; fish sauce; sugar; garlic; shallots; rice vermicelli; herbs; lettuce; dipping sauce
instructions: Marinate and grill pork patties and slices. Serve with rice noodles, herbs, lettuce and a sweet-sour fish sauce dipping broth.

recipe_name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee (Ca Phe Sua Da)
ingredients: strong coffee; sweetened condensed milk; ice
instructions: Brew strong coffee. Pour over condensed milk in a glass, stir and add plenty of ice.

ingredients: spaghetti; Pecorino Romano; black pepper; salt
instructions: Cook spaghetti until al dente. Toast cracked pepper in a pan, add some cooking water, then toss in pasta and finely grated Pecorino off the heat until creamy.

ingredients: stale bread; tomatoes; cucumber; red onion; basil; olive oil; red wine vinegar; salt; pepper
instructions: Soak bread cubes briefly in water and squeeze dry. Toss with chopped vegetables, basil, oil and vinegar. Let sit so flavours meld.

ingredients: fettuccine; butter; Parmesan; pasta cooking water; salt; pepper
instructions: Cook fettuccine until al dente. Toss hot pasta with butter and grated Parmesan, adding a little cooking water to form a silky sauce.

ingredients: spaghetti; prawns; garlic; butter; olive oil; chilli flakes; lemon; parsley; salt; pepper
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Sauté garlic and chilli in butter and oil, add prawns and cook until pink. Toss in pasta, lemon juice and parsley.

ingredients: dry lentils; onion; carrot; celery; garlic; tomato puree; chopped tomatoes; vegetable stock; olive oil; Italian herbs; salt; pepper; pasta
instructions: Sauté chopped vegetables and garlic, then stir in lentils, tomato puree and tomatoes. Add stock and simmer until lentils are tender and sauce thick. Serve over pasta.

ingredients: rolled oats; milk; yogurt; chia seeds; honey; mixed berries
instructions: Mix oats, milk, yogurt, chia and honey in a jar. Chill overnight. Top with berries in the morning.

ingredients: halloumi; couscous; cherry tomatoes; cucumber; red onion; lemon juice; olive oil; parsley; mint; salt; pepper
instructions: Pour hot water over couscous and cover to steam. Fluff and mix with chopped vegetables and herbs, lemon and oil. Grill halloumi slices until golden and serve on top.

ingredients: canned chickpeas; spinach; onion; garlic; ginger; tomatoes; curry powder; coconut milk; oil; salt
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic and ginger, then add curry powder and tomatoes. Stir in chickpeas and coconut milk and simmer. Add spinach until wilted.

recipe_name: Baked Salmon with Lemon and Dill
ingredients: salmon fillets; lemon; dill; olive oil; garlic; salt; pepper
instructions: Place salmon on a tray, drizzle with oil, lemon and garlic, and scatter dill. Bake until just cooked through.

ingredients: mixed root vegetables; peppers; red onion; olive oil; rosemary; thyme; salt; pepper
instructions: Toss chopped vegetables with oil, herbs and seasoning. Roast in a hot oven until caramelised and tender.

ingredients: Greek yogurt; granola; honey; mixed berries
instructions: Layer yogurt, granola and berries in a glass. Drizzle with honey and serve.

ingredients: tortilla wraps; cooked chicken; pesto; yogurt; lettuce; tomato; salt; pepper
instructions: Mix shredded chicken with pesto and mayo. Spread on wraps with lettuce and tomato, then roll up.

ingredients: black beans; onion; garlic; bell pepper; tomatoes; chilli powder; cumin; smoked paprika; vegetable stock; oil; salt
instructions: Sauté vegetables and garlic, then add spices and toast. Pour in tomatoes, beans and stock and simmer until thick.
